oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Transport, magnetic and thermal properties of La1−xPrxSr2Mn2O7
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MOHAPATRA, NIHARIKA
BHATIA, SN
KUNDALIYA, DARSHAN C
MALIK, SK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: manganites
transport
thermoelectricity
thermal properties
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: From resistivity specific heat (measured at B=0 and 9 T) and thermoelectric power measurements on La1−xPrxSr2Mn2O7, 0<x<1, we find the electronic and the thermal transport in these materials to be predominantly two-dimensional. The localization especially at low temperatures increases with Pr concentration. For x<0.6, the relative proportion of CE-phase grows with x, and becomes unstable for x>0.7 between 120<T<160 K.
